dict.string: This app uses speech recognition to enable personal voice features for text-to-speech. Personal voice allows you to use your own voice for reading documents, providing a more personalized listening experience. The app does not store or transmit your voice data.

This app requires microphone access to create and use personal voice features for text-to-speech. Personal voice allows you to use your own voice for reading documents. The app does not store or transmit your voice data.
This app may use camera access for document scanning features. Camera access is optional and only used when you choose to scan documents.
